Articles.Content: I launched a couple of small satellites of slightly different designs. The tracking station show them both as "Probe 0.4". Is there a way to rename them?

If you right click on the probe core you have an option to rename vessel.  You can also apparently do it in the tracking station but I have never done that, myself.

Edited April 2, 2019 by James Kerman
edited for grammar

in the tracking station it is an awkwardly placed function. In the tracking station you need to select the item in question. The you click on the kerbal icon in the bottom right. Then double click on the name. and proceed from there.

At least on the win/lin/mac version. on the consoles it might be a bit different.
